events.1781: British troops defeated Hyder Ali's progress. He was checked by Eyree Coote after the battle of Porto Novo and becamed subdued.
events.1852: For the first time in Asia, Postal Stamp for the general public was issued by Sindh Province in Karachi.
events.1856: In south, the first line was opened by the Madras Railway Company. It ran between Veyasarpandy and Walajah Road (Arcot), a distance of 63 miles.
events.1862: Calcutta High Court was established for West Bengal and Andaman & Nicobar Islands. This Court has a Circuit Bench at Port Blair.
events.1879: Post Card of one paisa was started in India by the Post and Telegraph Department.
events.1882: Dr. Bidhan Chandra Roy, great professor, politician, physician, leader and veteran nationalist, was born at Patna.
events.1902: K. S. Ranjit Singh "Ranji" scored 230 runs as the captain and Newham (153). They added 344 runs for 7th wkt at Sussex vs Essex.
events.1906: Pulavar Kulandai, great author and poet, was born at Bhavani.
events.1909: Madanlal Dhingra, revolutionary, assassinated Sir William Curzon Wyllie, a prominent Anglo-Indian, at the Imperial Institute in London.
events.1913: Kumarmanglam Parasshiv Prabhakar, former Chief of Indian Army, was born.
events.1927: Chandra Shekhar, former Prime Minister of India, was born. He was the eighth Prime Minister of India, between 10 November 1990 and 21 June 1991.
events.1928: Fifteen people were killed in Calcutta as Hindus attacked Muslims.
events.1929: Ramchandra Ganpatrao Shinde, educationist, was born at Burhanpur, (M.P.).
events.1930: Vinodkumar C. Gupta, leader in Maharashtra, was born.
events.1938: Hariprasad Chaursia, famous flute player, was born.
events.1947: Sharad NandKishore Yadav was born in Babai, Distt. Hoshangabad (Madhya Pradesh).
events.1949: M. Venkaiah Rangaiah Naidu was born in Chavatapalem, Distt. Nellore (Andhra Pradesh).
events.1955: Imperial Bank of India was inaugurated and was renamed as State Bank of India.
events.1958: Vishnu Sahay was appointed as the Cabinet Secretary of India. He held this office till 10-11-1960.
events.1961: Kalpana Chawla, the first Indian women astronaut (STS 87), was born in Karnal.
events.1962: Dr. Bidhan Chandra Roy, great leader, veteran nationalist, politician, professor, physician and architect, passed away.
events.1964: Industrial Development Bank of India (IDBI) was established.
events.1968: Asia's biggest nuclear research lab started in New Delhi.
events.1975: Indira Gandhi, then Prime Minister of India, declared a 20-point economic programme.
events.1982: MGR inaugurates Tamil Nadu's noon meal programme for poor children.
events.1984: Ravishankar Maharaj, freedom fighter and national leader of the country, died at the age of 101.
events.1985: Air Chief Marshal L M Katre, PVSM, AVSM and Bar, died in office.
events.1989: Yashvantrao Chavan Open University was established.
events.1990: General Sunith Francis Rodrigues takes over as Chief of the Army Staff.
events.1992: Truck operators begin nation-wide strike to press for the abolition of toll tax and octroi.
events.1996: RBI reduces cash reserve ratio to 12\%.
events.1997: Voluntary Disclosure of Income Scheme `97 (VDIS) comes into effect.
events.1999: Two leaders of Hindu Makkal Katchi (HMK) are detained under National Security Act (NSA).
